game.name: Pincushion
game.shortDescription: Pincushion is a quick and addictive game where your goal is to throw needles into a cushion without letting them touch. Test your reflexes and precision as you aim for a high score while avoiding any collisions. Can you master the art of needle throwing in this challenging and fast-paced game?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pincushion is a quick and addictive game where your goal is to throw needles into a cushion without letting them touch. Test your reflexes and precision as you aim for a high score while avoiding any collisions. Can you master the art of needle throwing in this challenging and fast-paced game?

reviewHighlights.text: Scam game. One level, just press space 20 times, you win, level resets. Don't forget that you can get the game refunded!
This game could be great but there are weird collision inconsistencies and it would be great if there were more than just the one cushion. Also, i wou...
